Notes.Text:
This update for libX11 fixes the following issues:

  - CVE-2022-3554: Fixed memory leak in XRegisterIMInstantiateCallback() (bsc#1204422).
  - CVE-2022-3555: Fixed memory leak in _XFreeX11XCBStructure() (bsc#1204425).
Notes.Title: Details
